_header: Father in heaven hallowed be Thy name
_description: ‘The vii Peticions to the ffader’ (Pater noster) — one stanza rhyme royal

Bod549.First Lines:
ffader in heuene halwed be thy nameThy kygdom til vs come now and
                    ay…
Bod549.Last Lines:
…And in to temptacoun thow not vs ledeBot delyuer vs from yuel
                    thought word & dede
Bod549.Attributed Title: The vii Peticouns to the ffader (f. 78)
